name: Krokonnektion
description:
🌟 Twitter Pollaris
 Hack your way into the Internet inc. building to expose the truth about the world to all mankind in this action-adventure-stealth-thing-game!

WASD - Move
SPACE - Jump
MOUSE SCROLL - Scroll messages
RIGHT CLICK -  Interaction
E - Interaction

🌟 Pollaris Studios Game artist: Francisco Lucas @ciscookiess Francisco_ Unreal Engine Programmer:  Nathan Gabriel NeitherNathan @NeitherNathan Musics and sound: Gabriel Rieper Rieps
